data.speaker: Player
data.content: Hey man, I really think you should take it easy...

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: It's... it's you... You did.... this...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: Dude, you look like you're gonna faint! Please sit...

data.speaker: Friend
data.content: Stay away from... guh... I... The floor...

data.speaker: Player
data.content: When we're out of here, I'm taking you to a hospital!
